page.title: 07Schools.
page.content: Stainforth Middle was built as a county secondary taking pupils of 11 till they went to work.Eastgate and Westgate First are two of the five schools which send pupils there.They are separate schools in one building. They were built back to back and used different parts of the same playground. Eastgate's part was bigger, which they thought unfair. Eastgate thought Westgate were trouble -makers. Westgate threw stones so Eastgate pinched coats.These schools are good for teaching you how to stick up for yourself as grown-ups.
